text: Ara tomara pita-mata yadi tomake amara sathe sirka karara jan'ya pirapiri kare, ye bisaye tomara kono jnana ne'i [1], tahale tumi tadera katha meno na ebam duniyate tadera sathe basabasa karabe sadbhabe [2] ara ye amara abhimukhi hayeche tara patha anusarana kara. Tarapara tomadera phire asa amara'i kache, takhana tomara ya karate se bisaye ami tomaderake abihita karaba
